Lexington Civic Service Webapp


    • Build a basic platform for the city of Lexington that will allow civic services to be more easily accessed by citizen
    • The platform will be built on a webapp that uses "tiles" to access or extend already existing city services.
    • We will also implement a "tile" ourselves

Trash Pickup Service

    • The tile we will implement is a trash pickup service that the city has, but it is not easily accessible.
    • The citizen would use the app to notify the city that they have put out a large item (matress, couch, etc...) that will need special equipment to pickup.
    • We will use the Goggle Voice services they provide in order to notify the city of the user's request. All the user has to do is access the "tile" on our site and input the necessary information.
